Desktop Application

About Me

My name is stephen but my friends call me SVEN, and I'm a frontend developer. My job is to provide you with up to date frontend solutions using a bleeding edge stack and create a wonderful online presence for you. I love to code and listen to music and I would love to work with you 😄 .
